info.title: B4HealthWebAPI
info.description:
Below section is about what to do with Auth/GetAccessToken, please read before you get started.


Access Token: Most of our web APIs require role-based authorization, which means user has to sign in first with their username and password to get access token. Then the access token will be sent in request header with key 'Authorization'.

- When playing with SwaggerUI, you call any web API that requires authorization, please call Auth/GetAccessToken first to generate an access token, and put 'Bearer YourTokenString(value of the response.data.AccessToken field)' in the Authorization textbox on the popup that shows up after clicking below Authorize button.
- Please note that access token gets expired in 10 minutes after it is generated, you may need to regenerate one if response says 'Unauthorized.'

get.description:
Case 1: Create/Edit Contract Assignment

/HospitalAdmin/ContractAssignments/CreateContractAssignment.aspx

/HospitalAdmin/Reconciliation/EditContractAssignment.aspx

If system has the setting CONTRACT_ACCOUNT_UNIT_MANAGER(166), set ByUnitManager to true.
```
ByUnitManager = true;
```
Otherwise set it to false.
```
ByUnitManager = false;
```
Case 2: Edit Requisition

Create Requisition - /HospitalAdmin/Requisition/EditRequisition.aspx

If system has the setting CONTRACT_ACCOUNT_MANAGER(159), set ByUnitManager to true.
```
ByUnitManager = true;
```
Otherwise set it to false.
```
ByUnitManager = false;
```
Case 3: For TNAA

Credential Expiration and Verification Reports - /Registry/Reports/NurseCredentialReport.aspx

SystemId is required.
```
SystemId = 152;
```

Signature is required to send along with requests to all the other web APIs, with header key set to 'HASHSECRET'. 
By doing this we can make sure requests are sent from valid callers. 
This web API is only for test, no real business scenarios need to call it. 
When you play with some tools such as SwaggerUI or Postman, call this web API first and copy the signature string from the response,
and put it as the value in the request header 'HASHSECRET' of your subsequence web API calls.

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: AppId is part of the signature, please ask web API provider for it, or find it with key "AppId" in B4Health.Api\appsettings{.environment}.json

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp is part of the signature, please use current date time, 13 bits of integer, for example 1686708665908

parameters.name: nonce
parameters.description: Nonce is part of the signature, please use a random string with minimum length of 32 bits

get.summary: Call this when you are trying to sign an end user in, after you get AccessToken put it in request header with header key set to 'Authorization', and value set to 'Bearer: YourKey'

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description: The maximum length of password allowed on UI is 25, in the web API it is 50 since it is encrypted

parameters.name: AppVersionId
parameters.description: The App Version user belongs to, pass null if user does not belong to any app version

parameters.name: LoginType
parameters.description:
1. No need to pass it by default.
2. api/Auth/GetAccessToken will return true as response.ChooseMode when user is a hospital admin and at the same time a nurse, 
this case user needs to choose which role to sign in, pass Admin = 2 to sign in as hospital admin, or pass Nurse = 3 to sign in as nurse.

get.summary: Call this when registry/corporate admin are trying to sign in as another user, the response will be the same as GetAccessToken

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: UserId of the user that registry/corporate admin tries to sign in as

parameters.name: AppVersionId
parameters.description: The App Version user belongs to, pass null if user does not belong to any app version

parameters.name: LoginType
parameters.description: When proxy log in, pass Admin = 2, Nurse = 3, Agency = 4, AgencyContact = 5 to make it clear which kind of user to sign in.

post.summary: Call this when user signs out, to clear access token cached on server side.
Call this when you are trying to renew access token of an end user, it creates new access token string as well as new expiration date time.

parameters.description: Value to fill in first placeholder in Pattern(if there is one), can be left empty only when Pattern is '*'

parameters.name: NumberOfTimes
parameters.description: Number of times to get result from Redis

get.summary: Get Redis Keys

parameters.name: Key
parameters.description:
Redis Key, case sensitive, when redis key is composed of multiple parts - contains a colon, it is the part before the first colon, or it is exactly the same as the const string in B4Health.Common.RedisKeys.KeyName.
For example if the redis key is 'Credential', then Key should be 'Credential', if redis key is 'Facility:123', then key should by 'Facility'

parameters.name: KeyPart0
parameters.description:
KeyPart0, case sensitive, is the first number part of a redis key. For example if redis key is 'Credential', KeyPart0 should be null or empty, 
when redis key is 'Facility:123', KeyPart0 should be '123' or '*' - 123 to clear 'Facility:123', '*' to clear all the cache where key starts with 'Facility:',

parameters.name: KeyPart1
parameters.description:
KeyPart1, case sensitive, is the second number part of a redis key. For example if redis key is 'Credential' or 'Facility:123', KeyPart1 should be null or empty, 
when redis key is 'Holday:123:555', KeyPart0 should be '123' or '*', KeyPart1 should be '555' or '*'

get.summary: Get Redis Key Sizes

parameters.name: Key
parameters.description:
Redis Key, case sensitive, when redis key is composed of multiple parts - contains a colon, it is the part before the first colon, or it is exactly the same as the const string in B4Health.Common.RedisKeys.KeyName.
For example if the redis key is 'Credential', then Key should be 'Credential', if redis key is 'Facility:123', then key should by 'Facility'

evaluationStatus.description:
Evaluation Status: SENT, RESENT, RETURNED, VALIDATED, CALLED IN, UNIT MGR UNRESPONSIVE, CANCEL ERROR

Format on Line #2:

1. EvaluationStatus = "RETURNED" or EvaluationStatus = "VALIDATED"

   Format: Record [FacilityEvaluationLogID with the link to view Performance Evaluation],[4 spaces][Response Type]

   Example: Record 1170,    Positive

   
2. For other values of Evaluation Status:

   Format: Record [FacilityEvaluationLogID], Sent to [Manager]

   Example: Record 2369, Sent to Maria Batis

evaluationType.description:
Evaluation Type: CONTRACT = 0; SHIFT = 1; PERFORMANCE = 2;

Format on Line #1:

1. EvaluationType = 0

   Format: [Evaluation Status] EVAL Contract, [FacilityAbbrv] [UnitName] [Evaluation Start Date MM/DD/YY] - [Evaluation End Date MM/DD/YY]

   Example: SENT EVAL Contract, BCC ADMINISTRATION 07/24/22 - 07/19/25

   
2. EvaluationType = 1

   Format: [Evaluation Status] EVAL PRN, [FacilityAbbrv] [UnitName] [Evaluation Start Date MM/DD/YY]

   Example: SENT EVAL PRN, BCC ADMINISTRATION 10/06/21

   
3. EvaluationType = 2, Date Range is visible when Evaluation Status is RETURNED or VALIDATED.

   Format: [Evaluation Status] EVAL Performance, Intrastaff [Evaluation Start Date MM/DD/YY] - [Evaluation End Date MM/DD/YY]

   Example: VALIDATED EVAL Performance, Intrastaff 10/07/21 - 10/31/21

paging.description: The pagination info that constains page index and page size.

sorting.description: The sort description that contains the sort column and sort order.

initial.description:
First letter of professional's last name, pass in 'All' if you want to bypass the last name check.
If not specified, 'All' will be applied.

professionalName.description:
Delimited by ',', ' ' at the beginning and end will be trimmed.
After trimmed the part before the first ',' will be taken as last name, the part after ',' will be taken as first name.
The input will be taken as last name if no ',' contained.
When searching by ProfessionalName, make sure Initial is 'All' or it matches the first letter professional's last name.
It does not work with combination like Initial is 'B' while ProfessionalName is 'Smith, John', 'B' and 'S' don't match, 
instead we should pass in 'S' or 'All' as Initial.

professionalName.description:
Delimited by ',', ' ' at the beginning and end will be trimmed.
After trimmed the part before the first ',' will be taken as last name, the part after ',' will be taken as first name.
The input will be taken as last name if no ',' contained.
When searching by ProfessionalName, make sure Initial is 'All' or it matches the first letter professional's last name.
It does not work with combination like Initial is 'B' while ProfessionalName is 'Smith, John', 'B' and 'S' don't match, 
instead we should pass in 'S' or 'All' as Initial.

permissions.description:
Permissions - Modify Shifts/Contract Assignments


Select the Programs you want this Admin to be able to add, edit and award Shifts and Contract Assignments for.
If you select a Program that isn't associated with any of the Facilities that the Admin belongs to above, 
then the Program will not be saved to this Admin profile. The Facility will have to be chosen above first. 
The Admin can only have Permissions to Programs that are associated to Facilities the Admin belongs to.


For registry version only, it's editable when this admin is not super user and not the logged-in Admin User.

biddingStatus.description:
1 - A Submission For This Shift/Contract Has Been Made 

2 - You Are The Current Low Bidder 

    Important: Another user may still outbid you, so check this shift/contract again on your Home Page before bidding ends. 

    How do you keep track of this item? Use the Home Page, which conveniently keeps track of all your bidding activities. 


    How does bidding work? Total Shift Control automatically bids on your behalf down to your minimum bid.If the shift ends for more than your minimum, that's all you'll receive the shift at. 


    Reminder: Being the lowest bidder does not guarantee you to win the shift/contract.Administrator Professionals are able to view your profile which allows them to check your skill sets and level of experience when determining the bid winner. 


3 - You Have Been Outbid By Another Bidder 

    Important: Another bidder placed a lower minimum bid than yours. To increase your chances of winning, enter the lowest amount you would be willing to work this shift/contract for. Total Shift Control will only use as much of your bid as necessary to win. 

	How did this happen? B4Health compares your bid to those of others.You were outbid because another bidder placed a lower minimum bid. 


	How does bidding work? Total Shift Control automatically bids on your behalf down to your minimum bid.If the shift ends for more than your minimum, that's all you'll receive the shift at. 


	Reminder: Even if you don't bid again, you could still end up as the winning bidder if your skill set matches the required criteria. Continue to check shift/contract status. 


4 - You Have Been Outbid By Another Bidder, You May Place Another Bid Below 

    Important: Another bidder placed a lower minimum bid than yours. To increase your chances of winning, enter the lowest amount you would be willing to work this shift/contract for.  Total Shift Control will only use as much of your bid as necessary to win. 

	How did this happen? B4Health compares your bid to those of others.You were outbid because another bidder placed a lower minimum bid. 


	How does bidding work? Total Shift Control automatically bids on your behalf down to your minimum bid.If the shift ends for more than your minimum, that's all you'll receive the shift at. 


	Reminder: Even if you don't bid again, you could still end up as the winning bidder if your skill set matches the required criteria. Continue to check shift/contract status.


5 - Congratulations! You Have Been Awarded This Shift! 

    Please contact the Unit Manager using the Shift Contact information below.

Authorization.description:
Access Token: Most of our web APIs require role-based authorization, which means user has to sign in first with their username and password to get access token. Then the access token will be sent in request header with key 'Authorization'.

- When playing with SwaggerUI, you call any web API that requires authorization, please call Auth/GetAccessToken first to generate an access token, and put 'Bearer YourTokenString(value of the response.data.AccessToken field)' in the Authorization textbox on the popup that shows up after clicking below Authorize button.
- Please note that access token gets expired in 10 minutes after it is generated, you may need to regenerate one if response says 'Unauthorized.'
